discourse_list.title: [Proposal] login to gitcoin via wallet address

content.content: gitcoin is bundled with several user identities from GitHub account, twitter, to wallet address Which make it a potential candidate to become the valid single sign-on provider as facebook or google. For the short/mid term, it will be nice if the user can login with his/her wallet address within the gitcoin ecosystem. Benefits: User can use their wallet (metamask or web connect) to login to gitcoin and the discord server (https://gov.gitcoin.co/) Possible approach: integrate the eauth server with gitcoin backend, ex:        GitHub    pelith/node-eauth-server An OAuth-compatiable service based on Ethereum credentials to authenticate users on a website. See live version at https://eauth.pelith.com/  https://forum.hakka.finance - pelith/node-eauth-server
that sounds like a great idea. i would love to have a secure gateway to the entire gitcoin ecosystem.  I’m just learning about the open web…and the potential is mind boggling!!!
